summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on January 8, 2010. The email discusses a request for a call and contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on January 8, 2010.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The communication is intended only for the use of Jes Staley.
